Description: - 2009 USA Godin Redline 2 Guitar, EMG 81 & 85 High Gloss Trans Red Flamed Maple Rare Mint Condition - Not a mark, and zero fretware! Made in USA - Made New Hampshire, USA, using Canadian Godin made parts! Set up to play easy, low and fast. Great feeling, easy neck to play, ferocious tone and sustain. 16" Fretboard radius and ergo cut frets. Includes Washburn padded gig bag.FEATURES: The Godin Ergocut shaping technique bevels the edges of the fingerboard and frets back in towards the center of the fingerboard providing an extremely comfortable feel. All Godin necks include this feature. Trans Red Flame Maple Top Rock Maple Neck with soft "V" profile Ergocut Rosewood Fingerboard 24 Frets 16" Fingerboard radius 24-3/4" Scale 1 -1/16" Nut width 2 active EMG humbuckers: EMG-85 (neck) and EMG-81 (bridge) 3-way switch, 1 volume, and 1 tone Fixed bridge with string-thru-body design Double-cutaway bolt-on construction Includes Washburn gig bag A modern electric guitar with irresistible features. The Godin Redline II Electric Guitar delivers searing and ferocious tone via its sustain-inducing, string-through, flamed silver leaf maple body. In addition to an active EMG-81 humbucker in the bridge position, the Godin Redline II also features an active EMG-85 in the neck position for a beefy and fat low-end tone. Any pent-up aggression can be unleashed on the fast Redline II rock maple neck with a comfortable Ergocut rosewood fingerboard and 24 super jumbo frets. It has a sleek headstock, thick black binding, and a stunning high gloss flame top. 100% Customer Satisfaction Guarantee Since 1991 If for any reason you are not satisfied with the product, simply return the item in the same condition you recieved it, and I will refund your money. Thank you
